## firms.Api interface

Entry point for firms to Smokeball.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Api 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get()](./smokeball-client-sdk.firms.api.get.md) | Gets the firm associated with the current context. |
|  [observe(callback)](./smokeball-client-sdk.firms.api.observe.md) | Creates a subscription for the firm associated with the current context.<!-- -->Only one subscription will be made per session. Regardless of how many times this function is called, the last registered callback will be used. |
